name: White Knight: Quest for Cake
description:
The White Knight is a humble soul with a naive and dirty mind. A dreadful combination of traits that makes him the perfect catalyst for all misfortunes this story has to unravel. Once he hears from residents of Lucent Kingdom that Princess Bianca is baking fresh cakes , he becomes overly attentive towards her out of fear  of not knowing what cakes even are. 

This is a touch and explore adventure game that satarizes blatant misunderstandings and subversions.
